SELECT CPLNT_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OCR_DTM ,ROUT_NM ,c.COMP_NM ,VHC_NO ,CPLNT_TYPE ,a.GPS_X ,a.GPS_Y ,CPLNT_CONTS ,JUDGE ,JUDG_ORG ,JUDG_TYPE ,JUDG_DESC ,DATE_FORMAT(a.UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTM ,d.NODE_NM FROM BRT_CPLNT_HIS a LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_COMP_CMPSTN b ON a.ROUT_ID = b.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST c ON b.COMP_ID = c.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST d ON a.NODE_ID = d.NODE_ID
AND COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || CPLNT_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND CPLNT_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND OCR_DTM between #{OCR_DTM} and #{OCR_DTM}
ORDER BY OCR_DTM
